resources.string: At this point you have likely discovered that this game is a lot harder then it initially appears. This is because this game takes advantage of the flash lag effect. The flash lag effect is a visual phenomenon wherein a flash and a moving object that appear in the same location are perceived to be displaced from one another. The effect can however be compensated for with practice. Several explanations for this simple illusion have been explored in the neuroscience literature but it is not yet fully understood.
If you enjoy using FlashPoint, please take a moment to rate it. Thanks for your support!
